main.details: I'm Ali, 18 years old, and I work as a front-end developer. I'm interested not only in front-end development, but also in Linux and the Python programming language. This website is my personal page, created with Next.js to provide a better insight into me.

services.description1: Create websites using NextJS, ReactJS, JavaScript, TailWind, CSS and HTML
services.description2: Drawing pages using Figma, Gimp, Krita and Luancy
services.description3: Use Linux as an OS and use it in some areas, LPIC 1

contact.title: Would you like to contact me?
